author.name: Lila Devereaux
author.about: Lila Devereaux is a Spanish-American author who began her writing journey in 2019. After migrating to America from Spain in 2005 to pursue her studies, she found her passion for writing. Initially starting as a blog and article writer, Lila transitioned to storytelling and recently began exploring the world of erotic short stories. She often collaborates with her wife, Selena, and her husband, Damien, combining their unique perspectives to create compelling and intimate narratives. Together, they are crafting stories that explore the intricacies of relationships, intimacy, and human connection.
